Obeth Mbuipaha Kandjoze (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 9 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1966 na Windhoek ) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Namibia nke SWAPO Party
Ọ bụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka Ngwuputa na Ike na Hage Geingob Cabinet kemgbe afọ 2015
Na mgbanwe nke Cabinet na Febụwarị 2018 ọ gbanwere ọnọdụ ya na Tom Alweendo ma bụrụ onye Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka National Planning Commission.
Kandjoze rụrụ ọrụ na National Petroleum Corporation of Namibia kemgbe 1999 ma bụrụ onye isi ya site na 2012
O nwere nzere Master of Science na geology na Mahadum nke Helsinki, Finland, nzere Bachelor of Science, na geology, na Mahadum nke Cape Town.
